scripts.winpy: concurrently "npm install && npm run serve" "cd .. && cd backend && py -m venv env && .\env\Scripts\activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && py app.py"
scripts.winpython: concurrently "npm install && npm run serve" "cd .. && cd backend && python -m venv env && .\env\Scripts\activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && python app.py"
scripts.winpython3: concurrently "npm install && npm run serve" "cd .. && cd backend && python3 -m venv env && .\env\Scripts\activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && python3 app.py"
scripts.linpy: concurrently "npm install && npm run serve" "cd .. && cd backend && py -m venv env && source env/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && py app.py"
scripts.linpython: concurrently "npm install && npm run serve" "cd .. && cd backend && python -m venv env && source env/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && python app.py"
scripts.linpython3: concurrently "npm install && npm run serve" "cd .. && cd backend && python3 -m venv env && source env/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && python3 app.py"
